page.title: Fruit Sale Order Form
page.content:
This year the band is selling freshly picked fruit from Pee Jay’s. We are offering navel oranges, tangelos, grapefruits, apples, pears, and pineapples! All profits benefit our award-winning band!

Download Fruit Sale Flyer

Download Fruit Sale Order Form

  • Print out order form and fill in your name and phone number. Please write your address on the top of the form as well.
  • Make check payable to: NRHS Band Boosters
  • Mail check and order form to:
    North Royalton High School
    Attn: Band Fruit Sale
    14713 Ridge Road
    North Royalton, OH 44133
  • Orders must be received by October 18, 2017
  • Your fruit will be delivered to your home toward the beginning of December.

If you have any questions, please call Heidi Cmich 216-224-2968 or Jaimie Poplin 228-217-8084. Thank you for supporting the North Royalton Marching Band!
